name: Numbers generator and validator
author: Axel Grytt

sections.description:
Numbers generator and validator is a good plugin for small businesses that want an easy solution to create a large amount of numbers or serials and store them.
It can for example be used to create numbers for products and let users validate them on your site.

Where do you find it

After you have activated the plugin you find it under tools in your WordPress dashboard.

Contact

You can email me at gryttaxel@gmail.com if you want support or want to leave feedback.
Sincerely from Axel Grytt.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the tools->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin

short_description: Numbers generator and validator lets you generate, manage and validate numbers or serials on your site.
